name: Receptivity (Introduction)
description:
While taking a bus home, Beli finds herself elsewhere.

Very short game made for a gamejam... while in another gamejam. Hence why its short.

While the introduction will be short, this will 100% be updated in the future, with the intention of filling it in better.

Amazing title artwork by Vasilva, please follow her, she deserves all the love in the world!

(If you find any bugs, please report them to me so I can properly fix them!)
